text: Hi everyone! Did anyone encounter the issue about the auto-generated pages with the pagination, not having an H1? I ran a semRush report in my page and have loads and loads of pages without an H1. Same for the pages with tags… If you encounter this problem, Which was your approach?
The thing that I can come up with is that your blog list template doesn’t have the h1 in it.. don’t know if it helps but good luck anyways!

Michael’s right- sounds like your blog listing template needs an H1. You can add H1s to all of these different pages in that template using the blog HubL logic - `{% if is_listing_view %}`, `{% if blog_author %}` , `{% if tag %}` (checks if you’re on a tag page), etc. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/blog#if-is-listing-view-statement|This doc> might help!
